description: This file defines the 'Listener' class for managing AWS Elastic Load Balancer (ELB) listeners, including methods for creating, reading, updating, and deleting listeners, as well as handling associated resources like certificates and target groups.

classes.name: Listener
classes.description: Represents an AWS ELBv2 Listener with methods to create, read, update, and delete the listener, managing associated configurations such as certificates, target groups, and protocols.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates the AWS ELB listener with specified parameters, handling optional attributes and associated target groups or default actions.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads and retrieves the current state of the AWS ELB listener, matching by port and protocol.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the AWS ELB listener identified by its ARN.

methods.name: _update
methods.description: Updates the existing AWS ELB listener with new configuration parameters.

methods.name: get_arn
methods.description: Retrieves the ARN of the listener.

methods.name: get_load_balancer_arn
methods.description: Gets the ARN of the associated load balancer.

methods.name: get_listener_port
methods.description: Determines the port for the listener, defaulting based on protocol if not explicitly set.

methods.name: get_listener_protocol
methods.description: Determines the protocol for the listener, defaulting to load balancer protocol if not explicitly set.

methods.name: get_listener_certificates
methods.description: Retrieves the certificates associated with the listener, including ACM certificates if specified.

methods.name: get_listener_tags
methods.description: Generates tags for the listener, including its name.
